Malice looked at the fox pawing at the door.  He climbed down from the hammock, reached over, and opened the door.  He reached up and took one end of the hammock off the wall and  let it fall to the floor.  He stood his full height and stretched, his back occasionally popping.  He sat on the edge of the bed, reclined back a little, and looked over the two on the bed.
"Well, I don't know what to do about the kids.  One left on her own, and the other?"
He thought a moment before a grin spread across his face.
"I dunno, the two of you look cute.  Maybe you're wrong about kids!"
He lay flat on his back now, laughing his head off.
 
OOC- My, he teases Wolfblade alot.  I wonder how this will affect the chemistry between them^_^

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
Wolfblade:
She turned to Malice and smiled. "Yeah, it was good. But what are we 
going to do with the kids?"  She looked down at Elita and over to the 
little kid laying on Malice.  She sighed and looked back up at the 
ceiling.

Camoflage::
She tossed and turned over. She jumped up and off the hammock. She 
landed on her feet, wide awake and looking around frantically. She 
ran to the door and pawed at it. "Open, open, open."

wrote:

and was whispering to Elita.  He glanced over to Camoflage, who was 
snuggled close to his mid section.  He smiled and pat the child on 
the head gently, then turned to Wolfblade.
> "Good evening.  Sleep well I take it?"

her
